title: used-tools â€“ Verwendete Werkzeuge
description: Liste von Software-Tools, die bei der Erstellung des Buchs verwendet wurden.

x-mappings.$comment: Schema.org has no property for software tools used in resource creation. schema:SoftwareApplication is a Type (class), not a property, so cannot be mapped. The schema:instrument property is for physical tools/instruments in Action types, not applicable to CreativeWork metadata.
